name: Multiarray-iso-proposal
tagline: Proposal for ISO C++ to modify std::array for extent counts besides one
body:
### About this Proposal
This proposal extends `std::array` from taking one extent for being built around a single-dimension array to arbitrary extents to encapsulate multi-dimensional arrays.  The extent list is implemented with the variadic template feature introduced in C++ 2011.

You can find the file, plus references, in the corresponding repository for this site.  There is a [copy of the proposal](array-proposal.html) directly on this site.

I introduced [discussion of this proposal](https://groups.google.com/a/isocpp.org/d/topic/std-proposals/s17-s_LXLT8/discussion) on early September 2013 in the [Google Group for ISO C++ Future Proposals](https://groups.google.com/a/isocpp.org/forum/?fromgroups#!forum/std-proposals).  That discussion sparked improvements, including the first version published here.
